sentences.english: We are Abraham's descendants in the faith.
sentences.chinese: 在信德內，我們都是亞巴郎的後裔。

sentences.english: As descendants of the early settlers， they were tolerant and hardworking.
sentences.chinese: 作爲早期移民的後裔，他們忍耐而勤勞。

sentences.english: Descended in part from Inca colonists sent here more than 500 years ago, the inhabitants of Taquile keep the old ways.
sentences.chinese: 部分居民是五百年前殖民者的後裔。

sentences.english: I also. The seed of Abraham are they?
sentences.chinese: 我也是。他們是亞伯拉罕的後裔麼？

sentences.english: There are reported descendents of Aisin Gioro present in China today.
sentences.chinese: 據報道目前愛新覺羅家在中國還有後裔。

sentences.english: Li Bai is the descendent of Li Chong'er, grandson of Li Hao, King Liang Wuzhao.
sentences.chinese: 李白爲涼式昭王李暠之孫李重耳的後裔。

sentences.english: The article also gives a brief introduction to Chen Wenhuan's descendant.
sentences.chinese: 同時對陳漢環後裔的情況也做了簡要介紹。

sentences.english: A battle in france in687among the descendants of clovis.
sentences.chinese: 克洛維斯的後裔687年在法國的戰鬥。

sentences.english: To overthrow their seed also among the nations, and to scatter them in the lands.
sentences.chinese: 叫他們的後裔倒在列國之中，分散在各地。

sentences.english: Are they the seed of Abraham?
sentences.chinese: 他們是亞伯拉罕的後裔嗎？

sentences.english: Being a descent of Xibo People, archery is my passion.
sentences.chinese: 作爲錫伯族的後裔，射箭是我的熱愛。

sentences.english: The son of a Venezuelan aristocrat, Bol var received a European education.
sentences.chinese: 是委內瑞拉貴族後裔，在歐洲受教育。

sentences.english: Aisin Gioro descendents now are from other branches of the family.
sentences.chinese: 愛新覺羅家現存後裔都是旁支。

sentences.english: He is descended lineally from an immigrant.
sentences.chinese: 他這一家是第一批法國移民的後裔。

sentences.english: Note the compendious final life of the emperors and their descendants who had great impact on the history.
sentences.chinese: 歷史上有較大影響的帝王及其後裔附註其簡明結局。

sentences.english: Maybe I was the descendant of a baby who was found wrapped in vines.
sentences.chinese: 可能我是襁褓中發現的嬰兒的後裔呢。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
to pass on/to hand down/tradition has it that .../according to legend
(lit.) leftover men/(fig.) loyalist adherents of a former dynasty/surviving members of an ethnic group
to move (from one residence to another)
